dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint- Net Result
dmca.body:
NetResult
Intellectual Property Protection

Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road 
London 
SW6 5UA 
Tel: 020 7471 1733
http://www.nr-online.com 

Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

Dear Sir, 

Please see the site http://cricket4u.net.googlepages.com/cricket which is infringing the copyright of two of our clients, Cricket Australia and Echostar Satellite L.L.C. Cricket Australia's copyright is being infringed by the site offering Cricket from the Commonwealth Bank (CS) Series featuring England, Australia and New Zealand. The copyright of Echostar is being pirated as the site is also offering the Series between India and the West Indies (WI). Please take action against this site as soon as possible.

I, Mike Kiernan, hereby state that Cricket Australia is the owner of the exclusive rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of Cricket Australia, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorised by Cricket Australia, its agents, or the law.
 
I hereby state that EchoStar is the sole owner of the rights referenced above and that NetResuit is authorized to act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance.

On behalf of the owner of the exclusive rights notice, I hereby state that I have a good faith complained of is not authorized by the owner, with respect to the content at issue in this belief that use of such A/V in the manner its agent, or the law.

I, Mike Kiernan, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information in the notice is accurate. 

Regards, 

Mike Kiernan
dmca.principal_name: Cricket Australia and Echostar Satellite L.L.C.
